thread.title: NAVOMI Cloud Solutions Joins Veeva OpenData Partner Program
thread.title_full: NAVOMI Cloud Solutions Joins Veeva OpenData Partner Program

author: admin
title: NAVOMI Cloud Solutions Joins Veeva OpenData Partner Program
text:
NAVOMI Cloud Solutions 
ATLANTA, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- NAVOMI Cloud Solutions today announced that the Company has joined the Veeva OpenData Partner Program. 
Veeva OpenData is a bold new approach to provide life sciences companies with customer data for healthcare professionals (HCP), healthcare organizations (HCO), and affiliations and do so with consistent standards for quality and service. 
The Veeva OpenData Partner Program makes it easy for life sciences companies to access and maximize customer data. Today, companies' ability to integrate and share data is hampered by restrictive vendor contracts. With data access agreements and partnerships in place with key providers, like NAVOMI, Veeva OpenData does away with those complications to make using customer data seamless and more cost-effective. 
"We are excited about the partnership with Veeva. This enables NAVOMI to continue to be a trusted partner of customer and build, deploy and manage the interfacing orchestration layer, allowing the customers' IT teams to focus on their core business instead of external integrations," said Vinod Koosam, founder and CEO of NAVOMI. 
NAVOMI's Data(n) on-demand, cloud based data and process integration service offers a fast, cost-effective, secure and scalable alternative to the life sciences industry's common needs to interface with growing number of systems that require integrations for compliance or otherwise. NAVOMI plans to leverage the Data(n)service to extend and implement integrations with Veeva OpenData. 
"We are pleased to welcome NAVOMI to the Veeva OpenData Partner Program," said Jason Wreath, VP, OpenData Products and Marketing. "The OpenData Partner Program makes it easy for customers to use the life sciences industry's highest quality data assets without burdensome restrictions." 
About NAVOMI 
Founded in 2009, NAVOMI is a professional services provider in the cloud and mobile applications arena. The company's core team of technology problem solvers excel in niche areas such as Salesforce.com, Veeva and LivePerson based application development, data/process integrations. NAVOMI is a trusted partner of a growing number of organizations that provide or consume Cloud technologies. Learn more at ww.navomi.com .
